comment_body: It sounds like an issue with your product key. Have you used it before?
I've had the same problem. Double-check that you input your product key correctly.

I don't know if I agree. I will say that JS has a wide variety of uses; however, it's limited in what it can do in terms of more complicated software development. I think that C++, while not quite as accessible to beginners, is a much more useful language overall.
You make a great point about the libraries! I agree that Javascript is a great language and I think it's fundamental for any programmer :)
I've been struggling to find one, too. I've heard that manufacturers have been having trouble keeping up with the demand so even major suppliers like Amazon have limited stock
It's the worst. I really don't trust any sellers other than Newegg, but even their prices are gouged...
